item.title: Second click npc
item.dc:creator: @hot_server hot server
item.description:
@hot_server wrote:

Okay… so here’s my problem :o

I’ve just started using project czar again and i have a problem with making new shops and moving the existing shops

Then i realised it’s all the second click npc’s!
Because of thieving npc’s giving the same error…

Heres the error i get :

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -61
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18625)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:17306)
        at client.packetSending(client.java:17275)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138)
        at server.main(server.java:53)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception

I’m not sure what to do!
Please help
If this is needed here’s my shops.cfg

Thanks alot, its really appreciated and I’m not worried about giving ***++
Here’s my wanneshop because i have reason to beleive it’s in there the problem!
